solution_line_template: The total length for the fifty fences is {num_fences}*{length_per_fence} = <<{num_fences}*{length_per_fence}={total_length}>>{total_length} meters.
If Emmalyn charged twenty cents to paint a meter of a fence, the total income she got from painting the fences is ${charge_per_meter}*{total_length} =${total_income}
